channel.title: Easy rsc help
channel.description: I may be illiterate but I forgot how to open up the control panel for the latest version of easyesc (der der der). I had it open then accidently closed it and my server went down. Now I can't seem to find out how to open it again?

item.title: Easy rsc help
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:11, topic:318405”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=414879.msg3054422#msg3054422 date=1260335402]

I got a question, so I’ll just ask it here. It’s related to EasyRSC, too.
All dragon items freeze my client. Is this suppose to happen?

Yes.

Oh, thanks prick.

Sorry I’m not a complete dumbass.

I found that question to be pretty dumb though.

Yes, because this is my first time running an RSC server.
Didn’t you ask dumb questions when you started?

Probably.

I found that assumption to be pretty dumb also.
[/quote]

I bet you did. But you honestly think I care?[/quote]

It sure seems like you do.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy rsc help
item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

laconte, download EasyRSC. I seriously thought it was going to be the biggest problem I ever started, but i just downloaded it and click run_server and it started up lol. Didn’t have to set up port forwarding or anything just to test some XML edits and projects i’ve been working on. Just click ‘start server’ when it comes up.

Read full topic
